name: Make it cute, make them think
description: Cartoons and anime are known for their dynamic and vibrant visuals, but beneath the cuteness they can also deliver powerful environmental messages and address the climate crisis.

key_work.title: NUTS
key_work.brief_description: The quaint and contemplative nature of walking simulator NUTS is expressed in the vibrant, Risograph-like print style. The game takes a darker turn when the player realises that shady developers are using the endangered squirrel’s behaviour patterns to assess the site of a proposed dam.

links.description: NUTS uses a colourful animation style to communicate the dire need for environmental conservation. Similarly, kids’ show The Animals of Farthing Wood deals with the stark realities of land clearing, forced removal of animal habitats and the effects of development and urban sprawl on entire ecosystems.

links.description: Large-scale climate events are dealt with in cli-fi, a sub-genre of science fiction. One great example of a cli-fi film is Snowpiercer , Set in the year 2031 which depicts an experimental climate control strategy gone wrong.

end.creator_credit: Jan de Bont, Ellen Mirojnick, Ian Bryce, Kathleen Kennedy, Michael Crichton, Amblin Entertainment, Constant c Productions, Twister Productions, Universal Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, Joseph C. Nemec III, Anne-Marie Martin and Ken Nielsen
end.brief_description: TV weatherman Bill Harding is trying to get his tornado-hunter wife, Jo, to sign divorce papers so he can marry his girlfriend Melissa. But Mother Nature, in the form of a series of intense storms sweeping across Oklahoma, has other plans.

constellations_other.name: Representing disasters
constellations_other.description: The devastating Indian Ocean tsunami was captured by many people on personal devices and home cameras, with the footage broadcast to the world. The event also inspired feature films that are part of a long tradition of disaster films, which often push the boundaries of VFX.

links.description: Twister is a formative example of the cli-fi genre, made in 1996, it paved the way for films such as Snowpiercer . Set in Oklahoma, Twister , sees a couple on the verge of divorce, have to set their marital issues aside to combat a series of highly destructive tornadoes and save the day.
